name: Aisha Muhammad
title: Community Health Tutor

education.institution: Kano State School of Health Technology

bio: Aisha Muhammad is a dedicated community health tutor passionate about empowering learners through practical field-based education. She focuses on preventive healthcare, maternal and child health, and malaria awareness.

testimonials.name: Fatima Sani
testimonials.comment: Aisha explains complex topics in simple language and inspires confidence in every class.

testimonials.name: Umar Bello
testimonials.comment: Sheâ€™s professional, patient, and understands the realities of community health work in rural areas.
